altTitles.ko: 백작가 영애가 황제의 번견을 길들이는 방법

altTitles.en: How the Count's Young Lady Tames the Emperor's Dog

altTitles.zh-hk: 伯爵小姐馴服國王看門狗的方法

altTitles.zh: 伯爵小姐驯服国王看门狗的方法

altTitles.ja: 伯爵令嬢が皇帝の番犬を手懐ける方法

altTitles.en: How the Countess Tames the Emperor's Guard Dog

altTitles.ko-ro: Baekjakga Yeongaega Hwangjeui Beongyeoneul Gildeurineun Bangbeop

altTitles.es-la: Cómo la joven condesa doma gentilmente al perro del emperador

description.en:
Esmeralda, the Count's daughter, is forced to enter into a political marriage by her father. But she asks Alphonse, whom she first met at a ball, to date her, as she wants to find her own destiny. Alphonse's identity turns out to be the Emperor's 'watchdog', who settles cases in the underground society for the Empire. It was Alphonse who started this relationship only to use Esmeralda for his mission, but his heart is gradually drawn to her, rushing without hesitation. Meanwhile, Esmeralda who has been working hard and dating hard gets caught up in the middle of Black German-Iris's conspiracy...

TW: Borderline toxic relationship in the beginning of the series. Please read with caution.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/4446000746)

**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/95283)
description.id:
Esmeralda, Countess muda, dipaksa menikah dengan pengaturan dari ayahnya. Dia mengusulkan hubungan cinta dengan Alphonse, yang dia temui untuk pertama kalinya di sebuah prom yang dia ikuti untuk menemukan pasangannya sendiri yang menentukan. Ternyata identitas aslinya adalah anjing Kaisar, yang menangani peristiwa alam baka. Untuk menggunakannya untuk misi, Alphonse mulai berkencan, tetapi lambat laun menjadi mencintainya saat dia bergegas maju tanpa ragu-ragu. Di sisi lain, dia bergairah tentang pekerjaan dan cinta, tapi dia terjebak dalam konspirasi Black German Iris...

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/4446000746)

**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/95283)
description.ko:
아버지로부터 정략결혼을 강요받고 있던 백작영애 에스메랄다.
스스로 운명의 반려를 찾고자 참가한 무도회에서 처음 만난 알폰스에게 연애를 제안한다.
알고 보니 그의 정체는 뒷세계의 사건들을 처리하고 있는 황제의 번견.
임무 수행에 이용하기 연애를 시작한 알폰스였지만 스스럼없이 돌진해오는 그녀에게 점차 마음이 쓰인다.
한편 일도 연애도 열심이었던 그녀는 블랙 저먼 아이리스의 음모의 한복판에 휘말리게 되는데…

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/4446000746)

**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/95283)
description.zh-hk:
被父親強迫進行政治婚姻的伯爵小姐艾絲美拉達，為了尋找自己命運的伴侶，在參加的舞會上向初次見面的阿方斯提出了交往

而阿方斯的真面目居然是負責處理後世界事情的國王的看門狗

雖然阿方斯答應了交往，但漸漸的，阿方斯對毫無顧忌的衝進來的她產生了興趣

與此同時，工作和戀愛都很努力的她卻被捲進了暗勢力的陰謀之中…

---
